alert.note: Alert for Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 6:34PM EDT until July 29 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Stanly County in central North Carolina... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 633 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Midland, or 9 miles southeast of Downtown Concord, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albemarle, Badin Lake, Plyler, Fairview In Union County, Locust, Norwood, Badin, Oakboro, Stanfield and Richfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
